title: The Story of Chinese art (TEFC)
brief_description: A survey of Chinese art from the unknown beginning of modern times. The influence of Central Asia, India and Europe on Chinese culture, as well as the influence of China on her Asiatic neighbours, the Near East and the West are shown.
